page.title: 11GUARDS FARM _ PRUDHOE
page.content: Guards Farm is an intimate treatment centre, S.W. of Prudhoe, where boys and girls, aged 6 to 16, come to spend a working holiday and learn discipline. They spend their time here learning skills; they cut the grass and dry it to keep as food for the animals in the winter. They make paths through the woodlands with small log bridges which they build themselves. they do not have many animals but those they do have are kept as pets, these include donkeys, goats, ducks and rabbits. They have also made their own market garden in which they grow potato and bean crops which are given to people in need.
